dc:contributor.description: Array of names and email addresses
dc:contributor.gltf_detailedDescription: Array of names, email addresses in the form `<email@email.com>` or both in the form `name<email@email.com>`

dc:coverage.gltf_detailedDescription: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant.

dc:creator.description: Array of entities primarily responsible for making the resource.
dc:creator.gltf_detailedDescription: Array of entities primarily responsible for making the resource. Examples of a creator include a person, an organization, or a service. Entities should be listed in order of decreasing precedence, if such order is significant.

dc:date.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

dc:description.description: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to a RFC 3066 language code and each value correspond to text in the corresponding language.

dc:format.description: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.
dc:format.gltf_detailedDescription: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.Prefer using a mediatype when available.

dc:identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.Can be in the form of URN or text.

dc:language.description: The language of the resource, array of RFC 3066 language code

dc:publisher.description: An entity responsible for making the resource available

dc:rights.description: A dictionary object providing information about rights held in and over the resource.
dc:rights.gltf_detailedDescription: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to a RFC 3066 language code and each value correspond to text in the corresponding language providing information about rights held in and over the resource.

dc:source.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

dc:subject.description: A list of descriptive phrases or keywords that specify the content of the resource

dc:title.description: A dictionary object, where each key corresponds to a RFC 3066 language code and each value correspond to the name given to the resource in the corresponding language.

dc:type.description: The nature or genre of the resource.Refer to the DCMITYPE vocabulary when possible
